text: Hini na nina bakholwayo! Fezekisani amaxanduva enu. Okuvumelekileyo kuni (ukuba nikutye) zizo zonke izilwanyana eziyimfuyo ngaphandle kwezo ziza kubuya zichazwe kuni (apha), iinyamakazi zona azivumelekanga kuni kuphela xa sele nambethe i-Ihrâm (yeHajji okanye i’Umrah). Inene uAllâh Uyalela oko Akuthandileyo
